name: BoxingBeats DEMO
description:
DEMO version for my game "BoxingBeats" that I am developing,

[CONTROLS FOR GAME]

Q W E R T Y U I - Spawn each type of shape

[INFO]

This game will be a rhythm / challenge game where you fight incoming boxes to the beat of a song.

[ADDITIONAL INFO]

- I am uploading this for feedback and suggestions, this is far from the finished version.

- The games style is simple and bold, if you are going to suggest anything then make it match the style.

- Everything is subject to change and I am open to suggestions.

-> POST YOUR HIGHSCORES :D
